Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students using a string telephone to communicate over a distance.
The student can include elements that show the string is tight between the two cups to effectively transmit sound.
The student can illustrate that sound is being used as the method of communication over the string.
The student can depict how the string telephone works as a technology to overcome the problem of communicating over a distance.
The student can show how people depend on such simple technologies to communicate.
